content: get ready to cozy up with this super soft velvet crochet candy cane pillow it s a plush and luxurious addition to your holiday decor that you can make in under an hour it s just like the expensive viral candy cane pillow you can find at the store but better because you made it yourself add a touch of handmade holiday magic to your space with this quick and easy crochet project difficulty beginner friendly pattern is written in standard us terms video help a complete video tutorial is linked in the pattern suggested hook size - 10 mm hook suggested yarn loops & threads royal velvet each ball is 54 yds 50 m 250 g 100% polyester jumbo-#7 weight notions - scissors - stitch marker miscellaneous & embellishments - fiber fill gauge - 2 in 5 cm = 3 st over 3 row of single_crochet in the round finished measurements & sizing - one size - the crochet candy cane pillow is about 16 in 41 cm tall with a 12 25 in 31 cm circumference this pattern can be viewed for free on my blog www justbcrafty com
